pages.text: After defeating the final boss of Minecraft and seeing the credits, the game is still not over, there are still many things to discover! $(br2)Minecraft has endless potential!
Search the new generated end gateway portal und explore the outer lands of the $(thing)End$()!

$(li)Collect rare endgame items $(br)$(li)Explore your world in all dimensions $(br)$(li)Get all Advancements $(br)$(li)Kill the other bosses like the $(thing)Wither$() $(br)$(li)Build massive bases and structures $(br)$(li)Install and play with mods $(br)$(li)And much more!
